PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The V OC , J SC , FF , and PCE values of the PSC devices are summarized in Table 3.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V OC |
| J SC |
| FF |
| PCE |

The four property names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage)
2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current)
3. FF (Fill Factor)
4. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V OC |
| J SC |
| PCE |

The three property names that clearly refer to material properties in the paragraph are:

1. V OC (Open-Circuit Voltage)
2. J SC (Short-Circuit Current)
3. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)

The entity "FF" (Fill Factor) is not a material property, but rather a parameter related to the design of solar cells. Therefore, it is not included in the list of valid entities.
